FuncDef: This command specifies the remote MEP ID as an alternative to the staticdest-macieee-address. When theremote-mepidoption is configured as an alternative to thedest-mac, the domain and association information of thesource mepwithin the session is used to check for a locally-stored unicast MAC address for the peer. The local MEP must be administratively enabled. Peer MEP MAC addresses are learned and maintained by the ETH-CC protocol.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the remote MEP ID of the peer within the association. Values-1 to 8191.
